name: Quad Bike: Racing Adventure
description:
Quad Bike: Racing Adventure!!!
Be the most intense and quickest offroad rider by driving quad bike in fast racing action on dirt tracks. If you like ATV quad bike racing simulator games then test your real off-road drifting skills and challenge your friends by achieving best scores. The reality of off-road speed racing with extremely high quality graphics with beautiful surrounding graphical environments. Enjoy the amazing advanced real physics and fast-paced gameplay
• Dynamic camera angles.
• The best driving physics.
• 3 Choice able quad bikes.
• 3d view graphics and environment.
• Realistic sound system in game play.
• Smooth handling of bikes.
• Powerful engine of quad bikes.
